name: MEC Reactor 10 Double Sleeping Pad - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description: Put some luxurious padding between you and the world. This double-wide mattress is thick and super-comfortable for sleeping out for several nights in a row. The substantial R-value makes it good for winter camping and cold nights. Everything from the soft cover to the 10cm of cushy thickness is deluxe, but the price remains modest.Polyester jersey feels soft on skin.Non-slip surface on the underside.Foam has horizontal cut-outs to reduce weight and packed size while retaining insulation.Large inflation valve and 2 deflation valves make set up and packing easy.Includes hook-and-loop straps to keep it rolled up, stuff sack and repair kit.
